object.name: ChatInviteLink
object.description: Represents an invite link for a chat.
object.html_description: Represents an invite link for a chat.
object.rst_description: Represents an invite link for a chat.

annotations.description: The invite link. If the link was created by another chat administrator, then the second part of the link will be replaced with '…'.
annotations.html_description: The invite link. If the link was created by another chat administrator, then the second part of the link will be replaced with “…”.
annotations.rst_description: The invite link. If the link was created by another chat administrator, then the second part of the link will be replaced with '…'.
annotations.name: invite_link

annotations.description: True, if users joining the chat via the link need to be approved by chat administrators
annotations.html_description: True, if users joining the chat via the link need to be approved by chat administrators
annotations.rst_description: :code:`True`, if users joining the chat via the link need to be approved by chat administrators
annotations.name: creates_join_request

annotations.description: True, if the link is primary
annotations.name: is_primary

annotations.description: True, if the link is revoked
annotations.name: is_revoked

annotations.description: Point in time (Unix timestamp) when the link will expire or has been expired
annotations.html_description: Optional. Point in time (Unix timestamp) when the link will expire or has been expired
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Point in time (Unix timestamp) when the link will expire or has been expired
annotations.name: expire_date

annotations.description: The maximum number of users that can be members of the chat simultaneously after joining the chat via this invite link; 1-99999
annotations.html_description: Optional. The maximum number of users that can be members of the chat simultaneously after joining the chat via this invite link; 1-99999
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. The maximum number of users that can be members of the chat simultaneously after joining the chat via this invite link; 1-99999
annotations.name: member_limit

annotations.description: Number of pending join requests created using this link
annotations.html_description: Optional. Number of pending join requests created using this link
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Number of pending join requests created using this link
annotations.name: pending_join_request_count

annotations.description: The number of seconds the subscription will be active for before the next payment
annotations.html_description: Optional. The number of seconds the subscription will be active for before the next payment
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. The number of seconds the subscription will be active for before the next payment
annotations.name: subscription_period

annotations.description: The amount of Telegram Stars a user must pay initially and after each subsequent subscription period to be a member of the chat using the link
annotations.html_description: Optional. The amount of Telegram Stars a user must pay initially and after each subsequent subscription period to be a member of the chat using the link
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. The amount of Telegram Stars a user must pay initially and after each subsequent subscription period to be a member of the chat using the link
annotations.name: subscription_price
